lms_contact_us.subject: Thank you for contacting us
lms_contact_us.text: Thank you Mr./Mrs. {{name}} for contacting us.We have received your message. Our support staff will contact you shortly.  If your inquiry is urgent, please talk to our support staff.  Hotline: +88 01844 616 717 Whatsapp: +88 01844 616 717 Facebook Messenger: Send message Thank you, Shadhin Team
